description: SmartSet GMV Endurance Gentamicin Bone Cement is a self-curing, radiopaque, polymethylmethacrylate-based cement that contains gentamicin and is used to fix metal or polymer prostheses to living bone during arthroplasty surgery where infection caused by gentamicin-sensitive organisms is a potential risk.
name: SmartSet GMV Endurance Gentamicin Bone Cement
